name: Paul Regret
text: All players see him at a distance increased by 1.

name: Jourdonnais
text: Whenever he is the target of a BANG!, he may 'Reveal!': on a Heart, he is missed

name: Black Jack
text: He shows the second card he draws. On Hearts or Diamnods, he draws one more card.

name: El Gringo
text: Each time he is hit by a player, he draws a card from the hand of that player.

name: Jesse Jones
text: He may draw his first card from the hand of a player.

name: Suzy Lafayette
text: As soon as she has no cards in hand, she draws a card.

name: Suzy Lafayette
text: As soon as she has no cards in hand, she draws a card.

name: Willy the Kid
text: He can play any number of BANG! cards.

name: Rose Doolan
text: She sees all players at a distance decreased by 1.

name: Bart Cassidy
text: Each time he is hit, he draws a card.

name: Pedro Ramirez
text: He may draw his first card from the discard pile.

name: Sid Ketchum
text: He may discard 2 cards to regain one life point.

name: Luck Duke
text: Each time he 'Reveal!', he flips the top two cards and chooses one.

name: Vulture Sam
text: Whenever a player is eliminated from play, he takes in hand all the cards of that player.

name: Calamity Janet
text: She can play BANG! cards as Missed! cards and vice versa.

name: Kit Carlson
text: He looks at the top three cards of the deck and chooses the 2 to draw.

name: Apache Kid
text: Cards of Diamonds played by other players do not affect him.

name: Belle Star
text: During her turn, cards in play in front of other players have no effect.

name: Bill Noface
text: He draws 1 card, plus 1 card for each wound he has.

name: Chuck Wengam
text: During his turn he may choose to lose 1 life poit to draw 2 cards.

name: Doc Holyday
text: During his turn, he may discard once 2 cards from the hand to shoot a BANG!.

name: Elena Fuente
text: She may use any card as 'Missed!'.

name: Vera Custer
text: For one whole round, she gains the same ability of another character in play of her choice.

name: Tequila Joe
text: Each time he plays a Beer, he regains 2 life points instead of 1.

name: Sean Mallory
text: He may hold in his hand up to 10 cards.

name: Pixie Pete
text: He draws 3 cards instead of 2.

name: Pat Brennan
text: He may draw only one card in play in front of any other player (instead of drawing from the deck).

name: Molly Stark
text: Each time she uses a card from the hand out of turn, she draws a card.

name: Jose Delgado
text: Twice in his turn, he may discard a blue card from the hand to draw 2 cards.

name: Herb Hunter
text: Each time another player is eliminated, he draws 2 extra cards.

name: Greg Digger
text: Each time another player is eliminated he regains 2 life points.

name: Black Flower
text: Once during your turn, you may use any Clubs card as an extra BANG!.

name: Colorado Bill
text: Each time you play a BANG!, Reveal! If Spades, this shot cannot be avoided.

name: Der Spot-Burst Ringer
text: Once during your turn, you may use a BANG! card as a Gatling.

name: Evelyn Shebang
text: You may refuse to draw cards in your draw phase. For each card skipped, shoot a BANG! at a different target in reachable distance.

name: Henry Block
text: Any player drawing or discarding one of your cards is the target of a BANG!.

name: Lemonade Jim
text: Each time another player plays a Beer card, you may discard any card from hand to also regain 1 life point.

name: Mick Defender
text: You can avoid every brown card with a Missed.

name: Tuco Franziskaner
text: During your draw phase, if you have no blue cards in play, draw 2 extra cards.

name: The Nose
text: He sees the last player that has damaged him at distance 1. He can also reveal a card form that player's hand at the beginning of his turn.

name: The Pear
text: Her bourgeois wealth allows her to discard 3 cards and choose an equipment from the discard pile.

name: The Rifle-Woman
text: Her gunpowder-powered fury allows her to discard a card, before shooting, and make a BANG! damage double.

name: The Rainbow Guy
text: If he has full life, he can play a Beer as a BANG!, screaming 'NON SONO UBRIACOH!'.

name: The Bobo
text: Faithful pray: once per turn, he can deal himself 1 damage to inflict 2 damages to a player.

name: The Four-Eyed Cat
text: Sleep Well: he can skip one turn to regain 2 life points.

name: The Prince Consort
text: Tribute: once during the game he can pick one card from the hand of each player.

name: The Beard-Barian
text: Every beer heals for three life, but can be the only card played that turn.

name: The Gibbous Robot
text: Each time he swaps weapon, he shoots a BANG! to the three next or prevous players.
